description.value: You sweep across the battlefield in a fluttering of movement honed from years of coordinating perfectly spaced movements alongside fellow dancers. When you attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through] an enemy's space, you can use Performance instead of Acrobatics.
